muck in.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to do your share of the work that is necessary in order to get a job done
muck in.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: If we all muck in, we could get the whole house painted by the end of the week.
muck in.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to share space with other people
muck in.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: There are only three bedrooms. Do you mind mucking in with the other boys?
